### Welcome!

I'm Alexandria Reed. I'm an Environmental Specialist with interests in programming, data science, data visualization, and science communication. I am currently a graduate student in the Master of Environmental Data Science program at the Bren School of Environmental Science & Management at UC Santa Barbara.
